import "./App.css"; import freeCodeCampLogo from "./img/freecodecamp-logo.png"; import Boton from "./components/Boton"; import Pantalla from "./components/Pantalla"; import BotonClear from "./components/BotonClear"; import { useState } from "react"; function App() { const [input, setInput] = useState("0"); return (
1 2 3 +
4 5 6 -
7 8 9 *
= 0 . /
Clear
); } export default App;
